name: DEEP SPACE | Space-Platformer
description: You think you can handle everything? Then grab a gun, jump at the helm of the ship and get ready for hardcore adventures in Deep Space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Atom Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I3 Graphics: Integrated Storage: 500 MB available space
